definitions.definition: A son of Gaia ; one of the Gigantes .
The innermost of Saturn 's classical satellites , marked by a giant impact crater ( Herschel ) on its surface.

main_definition: ( Greek mythology ) A son of Gaia ; one of the Gigantes .
secondary_definitions: ( astronomy ) The innermost of Saturn 's classical satellites , marked by a giant impact crater ( Herschel ) on its surface.
